text:
e="preserve">Mon Mothma is a character from Star Wars. Mon Mothma is the leader of the Rebel Alliance.
She first appears in ' in 1983. Caroline Blakiston played Mothma. Genevieve O'Reilly will play her in the upcoming series "Andor" O'Rielly also played Mon Mothma in in "Revenge of the Sith" but the scene she was in was cut from the final version of the movie. She was in the ' television series.
Mon Monthma is in many books in the Star Wars extended universe.
Fictional character biography.
Mon Mothma was a senator of the Galactic Republic in "Star Wars". She helped found the Rebel Alliance and she became the chancellor of the New Republic.
Fans.
Mon Mothma has many fans even though she was in only one scene in the first three movies. Graeme McMillan of "Hollywood Reporter" says this could be because only four women speak in the first three Star Wars movies, and Mon Mothma is one of them.
